name: Pit Stop Mechanic
description:
Pit Stop Mechanic is a game that uses Arduino based game controller. 

You need to have Arduino to play this game.

You're pit stop mechanic and your job is to change all 4 tires as fast as you can.

 

Hardware required

1. Arduino Board

2. 4x 10k ohm Potentiometers

 

 Circuit

 

 Uploading code to Arduino Board

1. Download git repository.

2. Connect Arduino to PC.

3. Open Arduino IDE and upload 'Arduino.ino' from git repository to board.

 

Launching game

1. Unpack downloaded .zip from itch.

2. Run 'Pit Stop Mechanic.exe'.

3. In main menu select serial port to which Arduino is connected.
